page.title: 07Life Styles
page.content: Some children in our group did a survey about what children do in their spare time. The results were quite surprising. Just in the junior classes about 90% of the every class go swimming or have swimming lessons. Also quite a lot of children did other sports: running, darts, snooker, football, ice and roller skating. So most people like sport. Some people like to do other things in their spare time like watching television, reading and making collections. However only 25% of the children enjoyed doing this. Some people who liked swimming cannot swim but go in anyway because of the fun. Thre are three swimmimg pools at Sale Leisure Centre. Many people watch a lot of television but they do not think of this as a "real" hobby.
